meanings.definition: Of or relating to an author.
meanings.sent1: The auctorial skills of the writer were evident in the detailed character development.
meanings.sent2: The book had an auctorial tone that made it feel personal and engaging.
meanings.sent3: The auctorial touch in the story added depth and authenticity to the characters.
meanings.sent4: Her auctorial influence could be felt in every page of the novel.
meanings.sent5: The auctorial perspective brought a unique voice to the narrative.

meanings.sent1: The auctorial work was praised for its originality and creativity.
meanings.sent2: Readers appreciated the auctorial style of the novel.
meanings.sent3: The auctorial signature at the end of the book made the reader smile.
meanings.sent4: The auctorial dedication in the front of the book was heartwarming.
meanings.sent5: The auctorial note on the cover hinted at the author's inspiration.

meanings.definition: Having the characteristics of an author.
meanings.sent1: The auctorial presence at the book signing event was exciting for fans.
meanings.sent2: The film adaptation captured the auctorial essence of the original story.
meanings.sent3: The auctorial flair in the writing style made the book stand out.
meanings.sent4: Her auctorial instincts guided her through the storytelling process.
meanings.sent5: The auctorial touch in the illustrations added a personal touch to the book.
